医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
COVID-19治疗显示最小的严重副作用在过去的四年中，美国食品药品监督管理局批准了Covid-19的许多治疗选择，包括抗病毒药物和单克隆抗体，这些抗体抑制了过度的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/covid-19-treatments-show-minimal-serious-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/covid-19-treatments-show-minimal-serious-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b43968a-a1af-40b7-957c-ed340d9c4990 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:40:00 -0400 COVID-19 treatments show minimal serious side effects
在减少外国援助的情况下，非洲面临增长的MPOX威胁公共卫生专家警告说，削减外国援助可能会导致整个非洲大陆及以后的MPOX爆发，病毒控制措施已经被破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/africa-faces-growing-mpox-threat-theat-amid-foreign-foreign-aid-reductions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/africa-faces-growing-mpox-threat-threat-amid-foreign-foreign-aid-aid-reductions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4B2B2BECB-08BD-44B9-8354-E825EC2E160E Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:31:00 -0400 Africa faces growing mpox threat amid foreign aid reductions
GSK3β被识别为BRAF突变黑色素瘤中耐药性的驱动力2025年4月4日，题为“GSK3β激活是对BRAF突变体性黑色素瘤细胞中RAF抑制的关键驱动力的主要驱动力，在Oncotarget第16卷中发表了一个新的研究观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/GSK3CEB2-2CEB2-SIDENIFIAD-AS-A-DRIVER-of-drug-drug-drug-recistance-in-braf-mutant-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/GSK3CEB2-2CEB2-SIDENIFIAD-AS-A--DRIVER-of-drug-drug-drug-resistance-in-braf-mutant-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B36CCBF2-FE98-4DBBBBBFCF-1933AAAF6974 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:23:47 -0400 GSK3β identified as a driver of drug resistance in BRAF mutant melanoma
更好的听力和视力与老年人更强的认知健康有关随着年龄的增长，我们的认知能力恶化 - 越来越难以记住，将自己定向在时空，并解决问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/better-herning-and-vision-linked-to-stronger-cogner-cognitive-nealth-nealth-inder-inder-Adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/better-herning-and-vision-linked-to-stronger-cogner-cognitive-nealth-nealth-inder-render-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=722b66635-0d91-4e07-9AA2-03C53AAE3AAE3267 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:20:55 -0400 Better hearing and vision linked to stronger cognitive health in older adults
HPV疫苗的吸收在AI ChatBot的帮助下增加旨在告知父母HPV疫苗的AI（人工智能）聊天机器人的第一次试验表明，它增加了疫苗的摄取和与卫生专业人员的互动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/hpv-vaccine-uptake-rises-with-help-from-ai-ai-chatbot.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/hpv-vaccine-uptake-rises-with-help-from-ai-ai-chatbot.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb3e7A9F-2625-40CA-837A-D5410B8B8B6B40 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:14:48 -0400 HPV vaccine uptake rises with help from AI chatbot
虚拟现实触觉模拟器提高技能并减轻牙齿训练的压力根据《国际牙髓杂志》上发表的一项新研究，使用虚拟现实触觉模拟器可以增强牙科学生的技能获取并减轻牙科学生的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/virtual-reality-haptic-simulators-boost-skills-skills-skills-and-reduce sursstrast-in-dental-in-dental-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/Virtual-reality-haptic-simulators-boost-skills-and-reduce-stress-in-dental-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c80ebd9d-c32d-4cb4-b407-e3e3e3dc12a552 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:09:42 -0400 Virtual reality haptic simulators boost skills and reduce stress in dental training
新的血液测试方法提高了癌症检测的准确性根据Weill Cornell Medicine和New York Genome Center研究人员的一项研究，一种与先前方法相比，一种新的，错误校正的方法比先前的方法更敏感和准确，可能对监测患者的疾病状况有用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/new-blood-test-test-method-improves-improves-accuracy-occuracy-of-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/new-blood-test-test-method-improves-accuracy-accuracy-occuracy-of-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=475184C9-969A-4FDB-B4B3-23913CD3A226 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 11:25:06 -0400 New blood test method improves accuracy of cancer detection
研究人员使用水风信子开发可生物降解的卫生垫在一次随意的谈话中，研究人员Pooja Singh和她的两个同事正在讨论开发可生物降解的卫生垫的想法，并开始考虑要使用哪种原料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/researcher-develops-biodegradable-sinational-sination-pads-using-red-using-water-hyacinth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/researcher-develops-biodegradable-sination-sinational-pads-usis-using-water-hyacinth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84726838-77E7-4B94-A613-3B85153B8FFB Fri, 11 Apr 2025 09:00:09 -0400 Researcher develops biodegradable sanitary pads using water hyacinth
研究突出显示儿童虐待与父母同理心之间的联系儿童虐待（CM）是一个复杂的问题，经常经过几代人。研究表明，被虐待的父母可能会使虐待孩子的类似模式永久化，从而造成恶性虐待循环。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/study-highlights-link-between-childhood-maltreatment-maltreatment-and-malteratment-and-arteraltal-agnpathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/study-highlights-link-between-childhood-maltreatment-maltreatment-and-arteratment-and-parental-altaltal-anpathy-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1DEA0D48-1D96-4E05-9457-79E163051AD6 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 07:29:34 -0400 Study highlights link between childhood maltreatment and parental empathy
脑部受伤和PTSD的警察面临更高的风险与普通人群相比，警察脑部受伤的可能性是两倍以上。在值班时遭受这些伤害的军官面临着发展复杂的创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）的风险的两倍以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/police-findicers-ant-higher-righer-risk-of--traumatic-brain-brain-injuries-injuries-and-ptsd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/police-clice-com--------------------------------traumatic-brain-injuries-injuries-and-ptsd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81253fa0-a5fe-4DB5-4DB5-862F-8E2D6A2E3D8D Fri, 11 Apr 2025 07:16:50 -0400 Police officers at higher risk of traumatic brain injuries and PTSD
